languages.text:
"Стремись наверх, туда, где в темном небе
Гнездо себе свил вороватый шторм.
Все клады бури там погребены,
Все пленники, богатства и трофеи.
Средь них покоится и створ ворот,
Ведущих в яви мир. Сквозь них пройди
К свободе столь желанной и манящей.
Все, что я мог, я дал тебе уже —
Соратников привел, шаги разметил.
Добудь же судно быстрое — и в путь!"

Гнездо себе свил вороватый шторм.
Все клады бури там погребены,

Средь них покоится и створ ворот,

Соратников привел, шаги разметил.
Добудь же судно быстрое — и в путь!"
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.
Amidst this cache a gate to realspace find,
Pass through to freedom tempting and so craved,
Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"
languages.original_text:
"Стремись наверх, туда, где в темном небе

languages.text:
“四处劫掠的风暴，
在阴暗的天空中，
将它邪恶的巢穴建造。
俘虏、财富、战利品，风暴掠夺来的珍宝，
都囤积在那邪恶的毒巢。
这些宝藏之中，有一扇可通往真实世界的网道。
穿过那扇大门，期盼已久的自由便是举手之劳。
我带来了你的同伴，提出线索供你寻找。
我的台词全部说完，退场时刻已然来到。
四处漂泊的商人，整个舞台都属于你。
想办法弄艘船来，离开这片是非之地！”
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.
Amidst this cache a gate to realspace find,
Pass through to freedom tempting and so craved,
Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"

languages.text:
«Apunta adonde la tormenta expoliadora creó
su escuálido nido entre los cielos negros:
allí la tempestad sus botines enterró,
tanto presos como riquezas y trofeos.
En esta tesorería halla un camino al espacio real:
avanza hacia la libertad, largo tiempo ansiada.
Compañeros he traído, caminos, mostrado; he sido leal.
Mis frases se acaban y ya no me queda nada.
El escenario es tuyo, mi Mercader Errante,
¡hazte con una nave rauda y continúa adelante!».
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.
Amidst this cache a gate to realspace find,
Pass through to freedom tempting and so craved,
Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「かすめる嵐が膨れ上がる場所へ駆け登れ
汚れた巣は暗き空の間にある
大嵐の略奪品がそこに埋まっている
捕虜も富も戦利品もすべて
宝の山にリアルスペースの門あり
手招きし、渇望する自由へと抜けろ
僕は仲間も連れて、行先も明かした
もうこれ以上の台本は僕にはない
舞台は君のものだ、放浪せし商人よ
船を見つけて風のように去れ！」
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.

Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Strebt auf zum Punkt, an dem der diebisch' Sturm
am dunklen Himmel hat gebaut sein Nest.
Dort oben, da ruht des Windes Beute,
Reichtümer, Trophäen, Gefangene.
Ein Tor zum Realraum findet Ihr dort,
zur Freiheit führt es, die Ihr Euch so wünscht.
Ich brachte Gefährten, Schritte zeigt' ich.
Gesprochen mein Text, nichts mehr zu geben.
Auf die Bühne nun, Händlervagabund.
Holt ein flinkes Schiff — und dann fort mit Euch!"
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built

languages.text:
« Rendez-vous par la force là où l'orage voleur a bâti
Son nid sordide au milieu du ciel assombri.
Là-bas, le butin pillé par la tempête est enterré,
Avec ses prisonniers, ses trésors et ses trophées.
Dans cette cache se trouve un portail vers l'espace réel,
Passez-le pour rejoindre cette liberté qui vous appelle.
J'ai amené des camarades et montré la voie,
Mais il n'est plus temps pour moi de donner de la voix.
{mf|Mon Marchand Vagabond|Ma Marchande Vagabonde}, je vous laisse la scène,
Trouvez-vous un vaisseau et fuyez ce domaine ! »
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.

Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"

languages.text:
"Çık hırsız fırtınanın peşinden kara göklere,
Kasırga'nın gizlediği kara inine.
Bul serveti, ganimeti, tutsakları,
Bir de zulanın arasındaki gerçekuzayın kapısını.
Geç içinden de kavuş özgürlüğüne,
Zaten çok koşmadın mı bunun peşinde?
Yolunu gösterdim, yoldaşlarını getirdim,
Bitti repliklerim, artık boştur elim.
Sahne sana kaldı Pek Berduş Tüccar,
Hemen hızlı bir gemi bul, gerisi sana bakar!"
languages.original_text:
"Strive up to where the thieving storm has built
Its squalid nest among the darkened sky,
The tempest's plunder hoards are buried there,
And captives, riches, trophies all within.
Amidst this cache a gate to realspace find,
Pass through to freedom tempting and so craved,
Companions have I brought, and steps revealed,
My lines run out, I have no more to give.
The stage is yours, my Merchant Vagabond,
Go fetch a vessel swift — and get you gone!"

traits.locale_text:
"Çık hırsız fırtınanın peşinden kara göklere,
Kasırga'nın gizlediği kara inine.
Bul serveti, ganimeti, tutsakları,
Ve zulanın arasındaki gerçekuzayın kapısını.
Geç içinden de kavuş özgürlüğüne,
Zaten çok koşmadın mı bunun peşinde?
Yolunu gösterdim,yoldaşlarını getirdim,
Bitti repliklerim, artık boştur elim.
Sahne sana kaldı sevgili Berduş Tüccar,
Hemen hızlı bir gemi bul, gerisi sana bakar!"
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
